name: personas-profiles
description: A Holochain app (hApp) for managing your personal private information.

scripts.prerelease: rm -rf ./release && cd ui-src && npm run clean && npm run build && cd .. && npm run hc:test && npm run hc:build && mkdir -p ./release && mv ./ui ./release/ui && mv ./dna ./release/dna && cp ./my-conductor-config.toml ./release/my-conductor-config.toml
